name: UnrealRoyale
description:
There are still some bugs in the game. And yes, there is no "play again" button, so you'll have to alt+f4 and reopen :p

Keybinds:

F - jump from plane/use your wings while falling

E - equip armor/weapon

R - reload your weapon

G - dance (aren't available while moving)

Tab - open a map

WASD - moving,

SPACE - jump

Left mouse button - attack
